channel.title: Joda Time on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Joda Time on Simple Solution

item.title: Convert Joda-Time DateTime into String and Vice Versa in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert Joda-Time’s DateTime object into String value and vice versa parse String value into Joda-Time’s DateTime object in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.

item.title: Convert SQL Timestamp into Joda-Time DateTime and Vice Versa in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert an SQL Timestamp object into Joda-Time’ DateTime object and vice versace from Joda-Time’s DateTime into a Timestamp in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.

item.title: Joda-Time Create DateTime with Time Start Of the Day in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to create a new DateTime object or convert an existing DateTime object to a new DateTime object with the time set to start of the day at 00:00:00.000 in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.

item.title: Joda-Time Create UTC DateTime in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to create a DateTime object to represent date and time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) time zone in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.10.9' To use Joda Time Java library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.

item.title: Convert Joda-Time DateTime into Date in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert a Joda-Time’s DateTime object into a java.util.Date object in Java.
